subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_009B_01C9DEE7.58923BC0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Yep exactly. Imprisoned by their own beliefs.

  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Steve Hill 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, M=
ay 27, 2009 4:18 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville =
WV






  We all have our own beliefs. I make no judgements on the living =
or the dead. I just communicate and record. I am an Empath, not a priest. M=
any,many spirits have asked me for help. If they can help themselves, they =
do not seem to know how. The prisoners believe that they would be trapped. =
if they died there. Are they imprisoned by their own beliefs?
  Steve




-=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
--
  From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
  To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 5:58:19 PM
  Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV



  In a way, I agree. "Stu=
ck" implies accidental. If a ghost is hanging around, it there by choice, w=
hether it is fully aware of that or not.

    ----- Original Message ----- =

    From: Frank Sumption 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
    Sent: Wedn=
esday, May 27, 2009 3:55 PM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Mo=
undsville WV



     I don't believe in trapped/lost souls, I think that's =
Hollywood. The trouble with doing investigations, I think, is you get the e=
vidence you expect to get, so it will tend to support the concept of stuck =
souls. When I record it supports my concept of sprits travel, and hauntings=
 are for show. Which is correct?--both at one time or another. 

     I did=
 a recording at lunch time, at home, and in it a voice says "ghost--right b=
ehind you". I was recording open air with the test board running.  

     F=
rank-S


    On Wed, May 27, 2009 at 1:54 PM, <SnowfireL@aol. com> wrote:

=




      Well, stand outside the thing, and help those poor souls out, her=
e they are making money at the cost of lost souls who are asking for help. =
 Shame on them, don't they realize  how many lost souls there are out there=
, waiting, go back (a few thousand years worth of them,)  were I to name al=
l the tribes, country, religions, throughout the years, people that died tr=
apped, in various places over century's, and yes there are thousand's of th=
em in the world, just dwelling in a cell of their own making, no progressio=
n, no light, no hope, without people they love, and who wait still loving t=
hem, they exist in these dark places without God.  This mission should be t=
o help them get back to God, back to the light of God, light of Universe ho=
wever, we want to call it, but in that light is love and happiness.  Just m=
y take, sf

      In a message dated 5/27/2009 3:42:33 P.M. Eastern Dayligh=
t Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:




        Yes, you need speci=
al permission. I was there for an all night ghost hunt as a guest of Easter=
n Paranormal. The place can be rented at night but believe me when I say "i=
t ain't cheap". Plus I don't think the prison would appreciate me releasing=
 the inmates before their eternal sentence has been served..
        Steve
=




-----------------------------------------------------------------------=
-
        From: "SnowfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>

        To: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups .com

        Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 2:31:57 PM 

  =
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV




        D=
oes one need special permission to get in there?  You folks should go back,=
 and release them since a few of them already know you Steve, this is Steve=
?  Right?  sf

        In a message dated 5/27/2009 2:15:10 P.M.. Eastern D=
aylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:




          Unfortunate=
ly I did not get to attempt to cross them. After my demonstration, another =
group that was also there started complaining that the box made too much no=
ise and was hendering their investigation so I turned it off. I wouldn't wa=
nt my direct communication with the deceased inmates to mess up their EVP w=
ork, now would I? I apoligized and put it away for the rest of the night.
 =
          According to the prison staff, the inmates firmly believed that i=
f they died in prison their souls would be forever trapped there. This beli=
ef was so strong that the prison officials would take the elderly inmates w=
ho were dying of natural causes to a local hospital so they would'nt have t=
o die in the prison. Maybe their beliefs were well founded.     




------=
----------------------------------------------------------------
          =
From: "SnowfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>

          To: EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups .com

          Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 12:36:12 PM 

       =
   Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV




          Th=
is is a wonderful recording, were you able to free any of them?  So sad to =
see them still there behind bars, must be very lonely for them, they should=
 be moving on so, they can start to work on making up for things on the oth=
er side.  You folks should go up there again, and hold a small prayer vigil=
 for them, of course they would no longer be ghosts trapped there, but ther=
e are plenty more around. sf

          In a message dated 5/27/2009 12:10:=
56 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:



     =
       I was invited to spend the night in the West Virginia Penitentiary t=
his past weekend... I was asked to give a short demonstration with my Optim=
us 12-797 hacked radio. Deep inside the prison surrounded by concrete and s=
teel, the radio could not pick up any radio stations in manual mode. I wasn=
't sure how this might effect the demonstration. I was pleasantly surprised=
 with the results. I recorded the session and the results can be heard at t=
his link. http://www.youtube. com/watch? v=3DKwDYu4RULlk
